title: Elegant Statement Collar Necklace with Floral and Peacock Motif
materials: 18K Gold (GH) with Rhodium Plating. Features natural fancy multi-colored sapphires
and a central ruby. Total gross weight 46.870 grams.
features: This exquisite collar necklace features two distinct sections: one a detailed floral design with diamond-studded petals, and the other showcases a graceful peacock motif adorned with a captivating mix of colored sapphires and diamonds. The design uses a pav√© setting style to maximize the sparkle of the diamonds and showcases the vibrant colors of the sapphires. The peacock's eye is marked by a single ruby.
colors: The necklace features a color scheme dominated by white diamonds and gold
beautifully contrasted by the vibrant mix of colored sapphires
and lavender. The ruby provides a striking focal point.
occasions: Ideal for special occasions such as weddings
and high-end parties. A modern twist on traditional Telugu jewelry
description: This is a true statement piece with a unique blend of floral and peacock elements. The high-quality craftsmanship and carefully selected gemstones ensures both luxury and durability. The design is guaranteed to turn heads and add a touch of sophistication to any outfit. It offers a fresh approach to classic South Indian jewelry, making it a perfect heirloom piece.
